forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 66, with temperatures falling to around 64 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 5 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 52. Southwest wind 6 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

weather_report:
In the heart of Downtown San Francisco, a bright sun shines down, casting a warm glow over the iconic skyline. With temperatures hovering near a comfortable 66 degrees, the air carries the gentle caress of a west-southwest breeze, playful and invigorating, rustling leaves and drawing the attention of wanderers. The serenity of the day belies an enchanting clarity; there are no clouds looming in the midday sky, only a vast expanse of blue, suggesting that any fog or marine layer is receding further out to sea, leaving behind a vibrant tapestry for all to admire.

As evening approaches, the pleasantness of the afternoon is likely to transition into a tranquil night, with temperatures dipping to around 52. For those venturing out, a light jacket or sweater would make a fitting companion, warding off any chill without becoming cumbersome. With such favorable weather, one might explore the charming streets lined with cafés, or perhaps enjoy a leisurely stroll through a nearby park, immersing oneself in the sights and sounds of this remarkable city. In this inviting atmosphere, an artful encounter with street performers or a quiet moment overlooking the bay would beautifully complement the day.
